meaningMnemonic: Remember how 内緒 means "secret" or "confidential"? Well, that makes this is a secret <kanji>talk</kanji>, aka a <vocabulary>confidential talk</vocabulary> — like the kind often done by <vocabulary>whispering</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi of 内緒 and kun'yomi of 話, only rendakued.
